message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1,200,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to the table.
That's a bit steep for me, Alice. I appreciate the offer, but I'd be willing to pay $800,000 for the product.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for this product. I'm counteroffering at $1,000,000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. This is a one-time offer, so I expect you to consider it seriously.
